column4: anyone think I should have any problems installed ubuntu-server on a hp ze4300 laptop?
It could be that the server kernel doesn't agree with your hardware.  What are you looking to use the laptop for? (why the server version?)
I have this laptop that doesn't really work as a laptop anymore (you haev to plug it in) so I though of using it as a server
Try the alternate CD.  It'll allow you to install a CLI-only version, and it uses the generic kernel, so you're less likely to have hardware issues
